spMisc 0.0.22
  • Functions

[+] List all functions in a package

list_functions.Rd

List all functions in a package and return it as a data frame.

list_functions(Package = "spMisc")

Arguments

Package

A name of a package. Default Package = "spMisc".

Value

A data frame with function names in a package.

Examples


list_functions()
#>       Functions in spMisc (0.0.22)
